main event: Multiple witnesses in Nogales, Arizona, reported seeing anomalous lights and objects resembling flying saucers on multiple occasions in August 1949.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing dull orange lights with concentric white light auroras, which appeared elongated and wafer-like in shape.
The objects were observed to move erratically, with erratic upward trajectories and elliptical horizontal flights, shooting off into space at high speeds.
One witness estimated the speed of the objects to be ten times that of a jet plane.
No sound or odor was associated with the sightings.
Interviews with local authorities and FBI revealed no derogatory information regarding the observers, indicating credible witness testimony.
sighted object: anomalous lights and wafer-like, elongated objects resembling flying saucers
